items.sentence: My friend, Tom, is a scholar and a fine gentleman.
Tom told me that Mary wasn't able to speak French.
Tom told me he intended to go to Boston with Mary.
Tom said Mary is the best French teacher he knows.
I didn't think that doing that would be that easy.
Do you judge people by the company that they keep?
Tom is at work now, but he should be home by 2:30.
This isn't as easy to do as I thought it would be.
I ate more than I should've at last night's party.
I think we all drank a little too much last night.
